About the Competition

âœ¨

Our Legacy

Sikkim Rising Star is the premier talent hunt competition in Sikkim, established in 2018. Our mission is to discover and nurture exceptional talents across various performing arts disciplines.

Over the years, we have launched numerous successful careers and provided a platform for artists to showcase their abilities to a wider audience.

ðŸŒŸ

Our Impact

  • Over 1000+ participants since inception
  • 30+ successful professional artists launched
  • Partnerships with national media houses
  • Annual viewership of 100,000+

Competition Categories

Singing

Showcase your vocal talent across various genres

  • Solo Performance
  • Duet
  • Group Performance

Dancing

Express yourself through traditional and modern dance forms

  • Classical
  • Contemporary
  • Folk Dance

Music

Demonstrate your instrumental prowess

  • Solo Instrumental
  • Band Performance
  • Fusion

How It Works

Registration

Complete the online registration form and submit required documents

  • Fill in personal details
  • Choose your category
  • Upload portfolio/previous work
  • Pay registration fee

Audition Round

Showcase your talent in front of our expert panel

  • Live performance
  • Technical assessment
  • Personal interview
  • Feedback session

Training & Mentorship

Selected candidates receive professional guidance

  • One-on-one mentoring
  • Workshop sessions
  • Performance techniques
  • Industry insights

Live Shows

Perform on the big stage and compete for the title

  • Weekly performances
  • Public voting
  • Judge feedback
  • Elimination rounds
